item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 8th February
item.description:
Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection. Two bags, one containing general litter and the other cans/plastic bottles for recycling. Next to the Innsworth Lane Sports Ground sign. The 'What 3 Words' location is ///examiner.slopes.courage The ordnance survey map reference is: 51.883919,-2.213313 Council Litter Bin Ref: 0254

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Road damage in several places., 8th February
item.description:
Road damage in several places at the junction of Southam Road and Mill Lane. The damage is the re-opening of previously repaired potholes that, yet again, are never repaired thoroughly and properly, so they reappear in no time at all. Should get the contractors back to fix them at no cost to the public purse. Dangerous as this is a busy main road towards Pretbury
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Mill Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooded road between 141 Village Road & Independent Living Centre, 8th February
item.description:
As above. Frequent occurrence at this spot and by Glynbridge Gardens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 147, Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 1 strand electric fence that can’t be seen, 8th February
item.description:
Just through a gate the footpath is blocked by a single wire electric fence that can’t be seen and no warning on it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury

item.title: New style put in dangerous and no way for dogs to pass, 8th February
item.description:
New fence been erected with a new style that is not a normal style and is very hard to cross and no space or design for dogs to pass without jumping over the whole thing which would be dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
